name: #HexDetective
description: Learn and practice to read hex colour codes

changelog.name: The Tutorial Update
bugs: It was possible for multiple persons to fit the description
Clicking 'New Game' after entering invalid difficulty settings caused a critical error

changelog.name: The UI Update
features: After accusing a person, a bar chart breakdown of the suspects colours is shown
If the choice was incorrect, a second breakdown is shown to compare the suspect with the accused
New button to completely hide ruled-out people
New button to unhide ruled-out people
New button to remove reset ruled-out status for all
Improved design and usability of interactive bar charts
New switch to auto-continue after a correct accusation

roadmap.name: The Difficulty Update
features: Prettier confirmation dialog when returning to main menu
Welcome message to make sure the users has an unbiased colour view (no forced dark mode, no sunlight on the screen etc.)

roadmap.name: The Mobile Update
features: Mobile: confirm choice to avoid missclick

roadmap.name: UI Update 2
features: Help texts to explain details, e.g. the fact that skirts are pants ;)
Each suspect gets a random name & crime
